availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Tabitha Graham Harris in Floyd County, Kentucky, on June 24, 1835. Father of Andrew Harris, Edwin Harris, William Jefferson Harris, Thomas Monroe Harris, James P. Harris, John Q. Harris, California Harris, Buenavista Harris, and Newton P. Harris. Farmer in Floyd County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, My District, p. 418B-419A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Floyd County Marriages, Film 007747400.
KYR-0001-020-0499.
